action.action-desc: Mr. Cole (for himself, Ms. Davids of Kansas, Mr. Mullin, Ms. Brown of Ohio, Ms. Moore of Wisconsin, Ms. Stansbury, Ms. McCollum, Mr. Johnson of South Dakota, Ms. Cheney, Mr. DeFazio, Mr. Case, Mr. Kahele, and Mr. Horsford) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Indian Self-Determination and Education Assistance Act to secure existing Tribal contract support cost reimbursements, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the IHS Contract Support Cost Amendment Act.

section.header: Amendments to the Indian Self-Determination and Education Assistance Act
section.text: Section 106(a) of the Indian Self-Determination and Education Assistance Act (25 U.S.C. 5325(a)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking but which and inserting including activities that;

clause.text: by striking his and inserting the Secretary’s; and

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (B), by striking the period and inserting ; or; and
by adding at the end the following:

would otherwise be carried out by the Secretary in support of the Secretary’s direct operation of the program, but for which the costs are not fully covered by the amount of funds required under paragraph (1).

paragraph.text: in paragraph (3)(A), by inserting amounts after duplicate any funding.
